name: Group 3 - Escape The Simulation
description:
Note: Play in Fullscreen for proper screen resolution. 

Details: Volume Control (Settings) can be found by bringing up the pause menu  (left-shift).  We will  be adding  a settings page from the menu before final submission as well as cleaning up the UI, Fixing the Name Input,  Explaining  the scoring system & instructions more in-depth, adding a few more questions to the levels,  and allowing  for more than one high score. (Will save 5)

In-Depth Instructions:

Escape The Simulation is a Python coding game in which players learn basic principles of coding as they explore various biomes in the game.  They must then solve problems using the information they learned to escape! 

Rules: The player receives 10 points for each correct answer and loses 5 points as well as a heart for each incorrect answer. If the player loses all his hearts the game is over. Upon getting all the correct answers on each level , the player will be teleported to the  next level and gain an extra heart with  a max limit of 3 hearts.
